p:
Successive epidemics of dengue fever, with co-circulation of DENV-1, DENV-2, and DENV-4, have been reported in Sinop over the last 10 years. Sinop Forest Park is an area of permanent preservation, surrounded by urbanized neighborhoods and is visited by several city residents and tourists. The diversity of local fauna, which includes non-human primates, armadillos, foxes, and agoutis, serves as potential reservoirs for DENV
10 . Hence, sylvatic DENV cycle may have been established in the previous years, as occurred with Zika virus in another part of Brazil
11 . Our findings did not suggest a local spillback event of dengue virus; however, the presence of the virus in forest-collected mosquitoes raises important questions about the source of infection in mosquitoes and the presence of viruses in other forest animals.
